metadata.default: Christoph Derszteler - Software engineer, student and music enthusiast
metadata.description: I’m Christoph, a software engineer and student based in Bonn, Germany. I developed an interest in programming at an early age and have been pursuing this passion professionally - initially as a freelancer - since high school in 2022. In 2024, I started studying computer science at the University of Bonn.
